entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 5.
